abstract: Colorado court unseals documents that offer insight into violent anti-abortion views held by Robert L Dear Jr, gunman who killed three people at Planned Parenthood in Colorado Springs, Colo in November 2015.
lead_paragraph: Documents unsealed on Monday suggest Robert L. Dear Jr. had long admired violent opponents of abortion, and offer a detailed account of the rampage.

headline.main: Documents Detail Scene of Planned Parenthood Shooting in Colorado Springs
headline.print_headline: Warrants Detail Attack on Planned Parenthood

snippet: Documents unsealed on Monday suggest Robert L. Dear Jr. had long admired violent opponents of abortion, and offer a detailed account of the rampage.
